description.p: This selects between a date alone or a date with a time.
A Calendar_date represents a month, the day, and year within the Gregorian calendar.

explicit.name: month
explicit.description: the month number within the year.

explicit.name: day
explicit.description: the day number within the month.

where.label: WR1
where.description: The year shall not be zero.

where.label: IP1
where.description: The year shall be represented by all its digits.

where.label: IP2
where.description: The year is negative when it describes years in BC.

entity.name: Date_time
entity.description: A Date_time specifies the time on a date which includes the times offset from universal time.

explicit.name: hour
explicit.description: the integer specifying the hour represented by the time as described on a 24 hour clock.

explicit.name: minute
explicit.description: an optional integer specifying minute within the hour represented by the time.

explicit.name: second
explicit.description: an optional integer specifying second within the minute represented by the time.

entity.name: Time_offset
entity.description: A Time_offset specifies the offset of a time from universal time.

explicit.name: direction
explicit.description: specifies if the offset is ahead, behind or exactly coordinated universal time.
